    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Moms</string>
            <string language="en">VAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">TVA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">IVA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φ.Π.Α</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">IVA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Skattskyldighet innebär skyldighet att lägga moms på all försäljning och rättighet att dra av moms på alla inköp till rörelsen. Modul 4 - Administration och Regler.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">Skattskyldighet means obligation to impose VAT all sale and right to deduct VAT on all purchases to the business. 

Module 4 - administration and rules.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ekonomi</string>
            <string language="sv">skattskyldighet</string>
            <string language="sv">försäljning</string>
            <string language="sv">inköp</string>
            <string language="sv">Riksskatteverket</string>
            <string language="sv">RSV</string>
            <string language="sv">skatteregler</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="en">wealth obligation</string>
            <string language="en">sale</string>
            <string language="en">purchases</string>
            <string language="en">National Tax Board</string>
            <string language="en">National Tax Board</string>
            <string language="en">skatteregler</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skattskyldighet bedeutet Verpflichtung, VAT 
aufzuerlegen aller Verkauf und Recht, VAT auf allen Erwerben zum 
Geschäft abzuziehen. Modul 4 - Leitung und rules.Is 
eingeschlossen in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Skattskyldighet signifie l'obligation d'imposer 
la TVA toutes les vente et droite de déduire la TVA sur tous les 
achats aux affaires. Module 4 - gestion et rules.Is inclus dans 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Skattskyldighet significa a obrigação impo o 
VAT toda a venda e direita deduzir o VAT em todas as compras ao 
negócio. Módulo 4 - administração e rules.Is incluídos em 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Skattskyldighet significa l'obbligo di imporre 
l'IVA tutte le vendita e destra dedurre l'IVA su tutti gli acquisti al
commercio. Modulo 4 - gestione e rules.Is inclusi in 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Skattskyldighet σημαίνει την υποχρέωση να 
επιβληθεί ο Φ.Π.Α όλα η πώληση και το δικαίωμα να αφαιρεθεί ο 
Φ.Π.Α σε όλες τις αγορές στην επιχείρηση. Ενότητα 4 - η 
διοίκηση και οι κανόνες συμπεριλαμβάνονται σε FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Skattskyldighet significa la obligación de 
imponer el IVA toda la venta y derecha de deducir el IVA en todas las 
compras al negocio. Módulo 4 - administración y rules.Is 
incluidos en FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
